snippet: Authorities in Daytona Beach have charged a pregnant South Carolina woman with attempted murder for driving her minivan into the ocean with her three children strapped in the back seat.
abstract: Authorities in Daytona Beach, Fla, charge Ebony Wilkerson, pregnant South Carolina woman, with attempted murder for driving her minivan into the ocean with her three children strapped in the back seat.
lead_paragraph: Authorities in Daytona Beach have charged a pregnant South Carolina woman with attempted murder for driving her minivan into the ocean with her three children strapped in the back seat.

headline.main: Florida: Mother Faces Charges for Driving Van Into Ocean
headline.print_headline: Florida: Mother Faces Charges for Driving Van Into Ocean
